revised_title: Advancements in Vaccine Technology: The Potential of Newer Viral Vaccines
tldr: This article discusses the advancements in vaccine technology, focusing on the development of newer viral vaccines. The author highlights the potential of recombinant DNA technology and the expression of protective antigens in improving vaccine production and quality control. The article also explores the use of peptides, anti-idiotypes, and new approaches to attenuated vaccines, emphasizing the importance of understanding the structure and immunogenic activity of viruses in the development of more effective vaccines.
